segments.text: Good evening , sir . I come to make the bed . Shall I do it now or later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , since you have come , do it now please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all . Have a nice stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.Please get some soap for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment . I will do it right now .
segments.speaker: S1
